title: Skin Medica TNS Essential Serum (1 oz)

The second chamber features the APS Corrective Complex, a mixture of multiple anti-aging ingredients such as antioxidants, peptides and more. These two formulas regenerate the skin by smoothing fine lines and wrinkles, tightening sagging skin, strengthening the skin's regenerative abilities, brightening age spots and fighting environmental damage. The complexion becomes youthful in both tone and texture, as well as brilliantly radiant and healthy-looking.  (1 oz)
